LanguageData.MakeAmmo_Nail_HV.label: Make BOOM Nails x50
LanguageData.MakeAmmo_Nail_HV.description: Despite the fact that railroad spikes generally deal fairly moderate damage, they are extremely effective in terms of damaging the limbs (arms, legs, and head) of an enemy, and are often capable of incapacitating the corresponding body part after the first hit. And in the case of a critical hit, they can completely tear it off and nail it to any nearby surface. Can be modified by adding explosives.
